$description: Mantine-specific core settings that are required by Mantine components but don't exist in CCUI's token system. These are added for 1:1 Mantine compatibility.

mantineSpacing.$description: Mantine-compatible spacing scale mapped to CCUI numeric spacing tokens. These provide xs-xl semantic names for Mantine component props.

xs.$description: Mantine extra small spacing (8px). Maps to CCUI spacing-8.

sm.$description: Mantine small spacing (12px). Maps to CCUI spacing-12.

md.$description: Mantine medium spacing (16px). Maps to CCUI spacing-16. DEFAULT.

lg.$description: Mantine large spacing (20px). Maps to CCUI spacing-20.

xl.$description: Mantine extra large spacing (24px). Maps to CCUI spacing-24.

scale.$description: Global scale factor for Mantine components. 1 = default size, 0.8 = 80% size, 1.2 = 120% size.

cursorType.$description: Cursor style for interactive elements. 'pointer' for clickable, 'default' for standard.

webkitFontSmoothing.$description: WebKit font smoothing. 'antialiased' for crisp text on macOS/iOS.

mozFontSmoothing.$description: Mozilla font smoothing. 'grayscale' for crisp text on Firefox.

headingFontWeight.$description: Default font weight for all headings (h1-h6).

headingTextWrap.$description: Text wrapping behavior for headings. 'wrap' allows line breaks, 'balance' balances lines.

radiusDefault.$description: Default border radius when no size is specified. References radius.sm token.

zIndex.$description: Mantine z-index layers using kebab-case naming convention
